intro.description: Follow these steps to create a Performance Investigator project and analyze it.

item.title: Install the Profiler
item.description: Transfer and install S60_3_1_Prof_v1_62.sisx file to the target device.

item.title: Setup and Start Profiler
item.description: Setup Profiler on the target device and capture application data.

item.title: Transfer Profiler Data File to PC
item.description: Transfer the profiler data file to the PC by USB, Bluetooth, or serial interface connection.

item.title: Import Profiler Data File
item.description: Import profiler data file in Carbide.c++ for analysis.

item.title: Analyze Application Profile
item.description: Analyze the profiled application data within Carbide.c++.
